DOC.brief_summary: This study will asses epidemiologic changes in eyelash characteristics with increasing age.
DOC.brief_title: Epidemiologic Analysis of Change in Eyelash Characteristics With Age in Healthy Women
DOC.criteria: Willing to have photographs taken of the face/eye regions No visible eyelashes Permanent eyeliner or eyelash implants Semipermanent eyelash tint, dye, or extensions within the last 3 months Use of prescription eyelash growth products in the last 6 months
